org.strongback.components

Interface PneumaticsModule


  • public interface PneumaticsModule
    A simple abstraction for the Pneumatics Control Module (PCM).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  PneumaticsModule.Faults
      The set of possible faults that this module can trigger.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Relay automaticMode()
      Get the relay that controls whether the module automatically runs the compressor when the lowPressureSwitch() is triggered and shuts if off when the switch is untriggered (i.e., the maximum pressure threshold is reached).
      PneumaticsModule clearStickyFaults()
      Clear all sticky compressor faults that may have been triggered.
      CurrentSensor compressorCurrent()
      Gets the sensor that reports the current draw of the compressor.
      PneumaticsModule.Faults compressorFaults()
      Get the faults currently associated with the compressor.
      Switch compressorRunningSwitch()
      Get the switch that reports whether the compressor is running.
      PneumaticsModule.Faults compressorStickyFaults()
      Get the sticky faults associated with the compressor.
      Switch lowPressureSwitch()
      Get the switch that reports whether the pressure is below the lower threshold.

    • Method Detail

      • compressorCurrent

        CurrentSensor compressorCurrent()
        Gets the sensor that reports the current draw of the compressor.
        Returns:
        the current sensor for the compressor; never null

      • compressorRunningSwitch

        Switch compressorRunningSwitch()
        Get the switch that reports whether the compressor is running.
        Returns:
        the compressor switch; never null

      • lowPressureSwitch

        Switch lowPressureSwitch()
        Get the switch that reports whether the pressure is below the lower threshold.
        Returns:
        the low pressure switch; never null

      • automaticMode

        Relay automaticMode()
        Get the relay that controls whether the module automatically runs the compressor when the lowPressureSwitch() is triggered and shuts if off when the switch is untriggered (i.e., the maximum pressure threshold is reached).
        Returns:
        the automatic mode relay; never null

      • compressorFaults

        PneumaticsModule.Faults compressorFaults()
        Get the faults currently associated with the compressor. These state of these faults may change at any time based upon the state of the module, and so they cannot be manually cleared.
        Returns:
        the current faults; never null
        See Also:
        compressorStickyFaults()

      • compressorStickyFaults

        PneumaticsModule.Faults compressorStickyFaults()
        Get the sticky faults associated with the compressor. Once these faults are triggered, they are only reset with #clearStickyFaults
        Returns:
        the sticky faults; never null
        See Also:
        compressorFaults(), clearStickyFaults()

      • clearStickyFaults

        PneumaticsModule clearStickyFaults()
        Clear all sticky compressor faults that may have been triggered.
        Returns:
        this instance so that methods can be chained; never null
